p: An accidental fire is an uncontrolled combustion process. The most common fuel is wood, or similar cellulose based materials, which mostly consist of carbon, oxygen and hydrogen. Wood may be chemically approximated by the formula CH 1.5O 0.75 [ 10]. The corresponding stoichiometric reaction with oxygen is: CH 1.5O 0.75 + O 2 â†’ CO 2 + 0.75 H 2O + heat (1)
